text: ‘Oh troh beurita bak jih ka aman Mukmin ka meunang dalam prang bicah Got pih teumakot haba ka talo Jiteubiet laju jak peugah-peugah Adak nyang jijak keudeh bak Nabi Got pih bak ahli jitanyong kisah Teuntee jiteumeung haba nyang beuna Hana chok teuma beurita nyang sah Í Adak kon rahmat karonya Tuhan Keu gata tuan teuntee that payah Teuntee taikot chetan ceulaka f Padum droe saja nyang ikot Allah
